Articles.Content:
So I just docked after a couple updates.

Have they changed the forward from "w" to "shift" and back from "s" to "ctrl"?

How do I switch it back?

Edited May 5, 2015 by Friend Bear

Now docking mode has several functions on same key, but you can still dock in staging mode.

Default controls are (I think), with RCS on:

H: forward

N: backward

J: left

L: right

I: up

K: down

(H/I and N/K may be inverted)

Oh I think I remember hearing the option to do this was available before but I was used to using space bar to switch back and forth.

I'll try this out! Thanks man
